title: Adding new (deep) subdatasets broken on win v6
body:
There is a subdataset `src/tnt` and I am trying to add another one in it.

```
H:\studyforrest-data-aligned>datalad create -d . src\tnt\deepsub
[INFO] Creating a new annex repo at H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt\deep

create(ok): src\tnt\deepsub (dataset)
action summary:
  add (notneeded: 1)
  create (ok: 1)

H:\studyforrest-data-aligned>git status
On branch adjusted/master(unlocked)
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
  (commit or discard the untracked or modified content in submodules)

        modified:   src/tnt (modified content, untracked content)

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")

H:\studyforrest-data-aligned>datalad add . -r
add(notneeded): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt\deepsub (dataset) [nothito add from H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt\deepsub]
add(notneeded): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt (dataset) [nothing to adrom H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt]
add(notneeded): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned (dataset) [nothing to add from H
tudyforrest-data-aligned]
save(notneeded): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt\deepsub (dataset)
save(ok): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt (dataset)
save(ok): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned (dataset)
action summary:
  add (notneeded: 3)
  save (notneeded: 1, ok: 2)

H:\studyforrest-data-aligned>git status
On branch adjusted/master(unlocked)
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
  (commit or discard the untracked or modified content in submodules)

        modified:   src/tnt (untracked content)

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")
```

Adding the direct subdataset works:

```
H:\studyforrest-data-aligned>datalad add -d src\tnt .
add(ok): deepsub (dataset) [added new subdataset]
add(notneeded): deepsub (dataset) [nothing to add from H:\studyforrest-data-a
ned\src\tnt\deepsub]
add(notneeded): .gitmodules (file) [already included in the dataset]
save(ok): H:\studyforrest-data-aligned\src\tnt (dataset)
action summary:
  add (notneeded: 2, ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
```

Looks like a traversal issue.
